snippet.title: Phoenotopia: Awakening - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Website: https://phoenotopia.com/

Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1436590/Phoenotopia_Awakening/
Purchase on eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/phoenotopia-awakening-switch/

Join Gail, a simple villager, who must heed the call for adventure when a great starship appears in the night sky and abducts all the adults. As the new oldest member of her fragmented community, she must set out to solve this great mystery. Little does she know of the grand adventure before her, the evil lurking in the shadows, and the role she will play in the fight for Earth’s very existence!

Note: The ESRB is listed as "T" in the trailer, but it was actually brought down to "E10+"

Links:
Facebook: https://facebook.com/phoenotopia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/phoenotopia
Soundtrack: https://sillythewilly.bandcamp.com/album/phoenotopia-awakening-original-game-soundtrack
